name: Royalfish Odyssey
description:
Brave a once glorious realm left to ruin

An expansive underwater world awaits. A dark, ancient power has surfaced & thrown the realm into chaos.

Explore an interconnected world, join factions, make allies and claim your lost crown.

Royalfish Odyssey is a new take on the classic MetroidVania genre, mainly influenced by Hollow Knight and Dark Souls. The game's biggest inspiration is the fishtank that sits in my office, each fish and zone is inspired by something from the aquarium :)

Sidescrolling adventure in a platformless world, with combat designed to be thought-provoking and represent the challenging nature of underwater exploration.

Choose your own path, explore hidden tunnels and face challenging boss encounters.

Utilize 3 unique abilities on your adventure and find a cast of unique characters to befriend.

  • Covenants! Rank up in one of the many covenants of Royalfish Oddysey to unlock new abilities.
  • Level up by allocating stat points to make your Royalfish stronger!
  • Choices that matter. Choose your own path to reclaiming and cleansing the Kingdom.
  • More customization - your choices will impact the appearance of your Royalfish. Will you become corrupted with the Curse of Midnight? The choice is yours.
  • More unique and wonderful boss fights!
  • More puzzles!
  • More zones and hidden areas to uncover!

You can contact me directly at developer@loremill.com

I love to hear feedback on my games, so feel free to leave questions/feedback on the game in the comments. Follow my Twitter for regular development updates.
